mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION ( NO , WRITER , CATE_NO , TITLE , CONTENT , ENROLL_DATE , DELETE_YN , MODIFY_DATE , HIT ) VALUES ( SEQ_KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO.NEXTVAL , #{writer} , #{cateNo} , #{title} , #{content} , SYSDATE , 'N' , SYSDATE , '0' )
mapper.select: SELECT Q.NO, Q.TITLE, Q.CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CAST(Q.ENROLL_DATE as DATE),'YYYY.MM.DD')ENROLL_DATE, Q.HIT, M.NICK AS WRITER, M.IMG_PATH FROM KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION Q JOIN MEMBER M ON Q.WRITER = M.NO WHERE Q.DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY Q.NO DESC

SELECT K.NO, K.TITLE, K.CATE_NO, K.CONTENT, M.NICK AS WRITER, M.IMG_PATH, TO_CHAR(CAST(K.ENROLL_DATE as DATE),'YYYY.MM.DD')ENROLL_DATE, K.HIT FROM KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION K JOIN MEMBER M ON K.WRITER = M.NO WHERE K.NO = #{no}
